name: Confidence
description: The Confidence class represents a best estimate of the validity and accuracy of the described impact (see Section 3.10) of the incident activity.  This estimate can be expressed as a category or a numeric calculation.

rating.name: rating
rating.description: A rating of the analytical validity of the specified Assessment.  The permitted values are shown below. There is no default value.

values.description: The element content contains a number that conveys the confidence of the data.  The semantics of this number outside the scope of this specification.
